flawed_nl_solution:
He consumes 2500+1000=<<2500+1000=3500>>3500 calories on Saturday
He consumes 2500*6+3500=<<2500*6+3500=18050>>18050 calories in the week.
He burns 3000*7=<<3000*7=21000>>21000 calories in the week
His caloric deficit is 21000-18050=<<21000-18050=2950>>2950 calories per week

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18500, not 18050. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
